comment.author: 20215360@N04
comment._content: The photo's probably shot near the mountain and view point Varden north of downtown Molde, the photographer facing south. The following photo of the same view in 2006 is from the actual view point on top of Varden, but it looks like it's shot a bit higher up than LOC's photo: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/marcel-more/262494262/] See also Varden, Molde on Google Maps.
